message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see how it goes from here!
I'll start with a slightly more aggressive offer. You can try to negotiate from here!
That's a bit too aggressive for me. I'm thinking more like 55/45 or 56/44 in my favor.
I'm sticking to my guns on this one. 55/45 seems like a fair split to me. What do you think?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly better deal. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with 52% for you. How about 50/50 again?
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I think 52/48 is the best I can do. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I think I can do better than this. Take a chance on me!
Alright, I'll take the deal. 45/55 it is. Let's call it a day!
